description: The Lok Sabha on Wednesday SHANTI Bill, 2025, paving the way for private sector participation in India's nuclear energy industry. This legislation (yet to be passed in Rajya Sabha) introduces a new civil liability framework and strengthens the Atomic Energy Regulatory Board. While crucial operations remain government-controlled, the bill aims to boost nuclear power capacity and applications, encouraging investment in the sector.

Guided by his late coach Vivek Yadav, backed by Anshu Jain, and shaped by advice from Pat Cummins and Bharat Arun, the 23-year-old has emerged as the standout bowler of the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy. With raw speed now married to control, Ashok is fast becoming the speedster to watch out for.

Why‍‌‍‍‌‍‌‍‍‌ skin on feet becomes hard and thick?
description: Hard skin on feet develops gradually due to constant pressure and friction. This thickening is the skin's way of protecting itself from mechanical stress.  Ignoring these changes can lead to painful cracks and infections.  Proper moisturising and supportive footwear are key to maintaining healthy, flexible foot skin.  Addressing discomfort early prevents further complications.

title: Defying Trump sanctions? India's oil imports from Russia hit 1m barrels a day

title: SSN College to stop admissions from 2026–27: What changes & what this means for students ?

Nick, who has a history of addiction and violent outbursts, was arrested and charged with their murders.

title: Ayesha Curry admits she never expected to fall for NBA legend Stephen Curry

Ayesha's unwavering support, even encouraging Stephen to finish his degree before the NBA draft, solidified his decision to marry her. Their enduring marriage has weathered public scrutiny, with Stephen consistently crediting his wife.

title: Inside Connor McDavid’s luxury car collection: supercars, favorites, and what makes it unique
description: Hockey superstar Connor McDavid's impressive car collection mirrors his on-ice prowess. Featuring a diverse range from the roaring Lamborghini Huracán and precise Audi R8 to the luxurious Range Rover Vogue and powerful Chevrolet Camaro ZL1, his fleet showcases speed, precision, and personality. The Porsche 911 GT2 RS stands out as his favorite, embodying his passion for high-performance engineering.
